name: Avoid Programs with more than X lines of code  (RPG300)
description: This rule searches for all the programs having more than X lines of code.
output:
This report lists RPG300 programs with more than X lines of code. X is parameter value
It provides the following information:
RPG300 Program full name, no. of lines in the Program
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there the programs are not too big.
remediation: Review the source code in order to have programs with less than X lines of code.
